Package rekit.persistence.level

Class LevelManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • rekit.persistence.level.LevelManager

  • public final class LevelManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages all Level depended stuff as defined in DataKey.
    Author:
    Dominik Fuchss

      • init

      • addArcadeLevel

        public static java.lang.String addArcadeLevel​(java.io.InputStream levelStructure,
                                              boolean reloadUserData)
                                       throws UnexpectedTokenException,
                                              java.io.IOException
        Add a level by structure-file.
        Parameters:
        levelStructure - the level structure
        reloadUserData - indicates whether userdata file shall be reloaded for highscore etc.
        Returns:
        the id of the level or null if error occurred
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - will thrown if Resources are not accessible
        UnexpectedTokenException - will thrown if syntax of Resources are wrong

        Get the infinite level.
        Returns:
        the infinite level

        Returns:

      • getArcadeLevelGroups

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getArcadeLevelGroups​()
        Get a map of arcade levels (grouped).
        Returns:
        a grouped (map) of arcade levels

      • addLevel

        public static java.lang.String addLevel​(LevelDefinition level,
                                        boolean reloadUserData)
        Add a level to the manager.
        Parameters:
        level - the level
        reloadUserData - indicates whether userdata file shall be reloaded for highscore etc.
        Returns:
        the id of the level
